p:
Third, although transmission of other alphaviruses, such as Mayaro and oâ€™nyong-nyong, has not been reported in northeastern Brazil, because we did not perform PRNT 90 for other alphaviruses, we cannot completely rule out the possibility of cross-reactions. In addition, it has been shown that IgG seroconversion might not occur or may occur at later stages after CHIKV infection, possibly due to a strong and longlasting CHIKV IgM immune response (
46 ) . It is possible that this diagnostic limitation hampered detection of some cases of CHIKV infection, especially those occurring shortly before the survey was conducted.
